sent.orig: A report on wage rise in the public sector or on public sector wage settlement.
sent.trans: 一项关于公共部门或政府资助企业工资增涨的报告。

sent.orig: The efficiency-related wage system determined that over 70% Chinese worker's wage has strong nominal stickiness.
sent.trans: 效益工资制度决定中国70％以上工人的工资具有较强粘性。

sent.orig: Post benefit wage system and incentive piecework system both are incentive staffs business wage distribution methods.
sent.trans: 岗效工资制和激励计件工资制是两种能够激励员工的企业工资分配办法。

sent.orig: You cannot lift the wage earner up by pulling the wage payer down.
sent.trans: 你不能因着要提高受薪人的工资就要付薪人垮掉。

sent.orig: You cannot lift the wage earner by pulling down the wage payer.
sent.trans: 你不能通过从发工资的那里直接抽取金钱来援助工薪阶层。
